topic.title: Migration from eerohele/dita-ot-gradle
topic.shortdesc: Upgrade guide for users of the original plugin.

body.p: This plugin is a fork of eerohele/dita-ot-gradle with additional features and improvements.

ul.li: Full Configuration Cache Support: 77% faster incremental builds
Gradle 9 Compatibility: Works with latest Gradle versions
Active Maintenance: Regular updates and bug fixes
Improved Documentation: Comprehensive examples and guides

li.p: Review Task Configuration: Most configurations are compatible. Update any deprecated options.
Enable Configuration Cache: Add to gradle.properties:
Test Your Build: Run your existing build to verify compatibility.

section.title: Breaking Changes
section.p: There are no breaking changes from the original plugin. All existing configurations should work without modification.
